entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this morning. High 8. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
